map.smalltown.name: Briar Glen
map.smalltown.description: A quaint hamlet nestled among winding creeks and verdant meadows, Briar Glen is known for its close-knit community and rustic charm.
map.smalltown.rooms.townsquare.name: Town Square
map.smalltown.rooms.townsquare.descripti: The heart of Briar Glen, surrounded by an old well and various small shops. Cobblestone paths lead out in all directions.
map.smalltown.rooms.mayorhouse.name: Mayor's Manor
map.smalltown.rooms.mayorhouse.descripti: An elegant two-story building that stands out from the surrounding structures with its well-tended garden and ornate decorations.
map.smalltown.rooms.blacksmithshop.name: Blacksmith's Forge
map.smalltown.rooms.blacksmithshop.descr: The clang of hammer on anvil rings out from this stone-walled building. A display of swords and armor sits by the entrance.
map.smalltown.rooms.tavern.name: The Weary Traveler Tavern
map.smalltown.rooms.tavern.description: A warm, welcoming place filled with the chatter of townsfolk and the aroma of hearty meals.
map.smalltown.rooms.temple.name: Temple of the Whispering Winds
map.smalltown.rooms.temple.description: An ancient temple with tall spires. Its walls are lined with wind chimes that create melodious tunes when the breeze blows.
map.smalltown.rooms.market.name: Open Market
map.smalltown.rooms.market.description: A bustling center of trade where vendors from all around offer their goods, from rare spices to handwoven textiles.
